title: Funnydruids
author: Funnydruids
created_time: October 20, 2022, 08:26:01 PMLast edit: April 03, 2023, 02:51:05 PM by Funnydruids
content: I like to buy btc with paypal

comments.author: Extrarakeback
comments.body: Why didn't you go to paxful ?Didnt you come mypost to  say so while you have your post here ? So weirdo you deserve a bad trust

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: Funnydruids on October 20, 2022, 08:26:01 PMI mean if you are so poor you need to scam people for like 20-50 USD... yeah then i just laugh. you will make alot more for long term trading.Since you are the one with PayPal = reversible payment system, there's much bigger chance you try to scam for... no matter the amount.So until the point you build up trust you should really consider using irreversible means of fiat payment (and maybe escrow too).

I just want to trade with EU accounts.Can use paxful/lcb.

comments.author: Funnydruids
comments.body: And why I looking here.98% of the PayPal offers are Kenyans... I want to trade with a swedish or eu account.Of course we can use Escrow. Even better!

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: Funnydruids on October 21, 2022, 04:29:17 PMOf course we can use Escrow. Even better!Are you willing to let the escrow agent hold the bitcoin for 6 months, the time limit for submitting PayPal chargebacks?  If not then escrow is pointless, as are your responses.  You are sounding more and more like a scammer with every post.  If you aren't a scammer you would be offering TransferWise, wire transfers, or even Revolut, all of which are far safer for the seller than PayPutz.
